root.name: Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney Trilogy HD
root.description: OverviewComparison shotPhoenix Wright: Ace Attorney Trilogy HD is a collection of the original trilogy of the Ace Attorney series: Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney, Justice For All, and Trials Tribulations ported to iOS. It was released in Japan on February 7th, 2012, and on May 30th, 2013 for the US. Ace Attorney is a series of adventure/visual novel games that center around the insane courtroom cases of defense attorney Phoenix Wright. They were originally released on the Game Boy Advance in Japan, but are more known in North America and Europe for their rereleases on the Nintendo DS and Wiiware.Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney Trilogy HD contains the original three Ace Attorney games. The first two cases in "Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney" are free while the remain cases are available for $5.99. "Justice for All" and "Trials and Tribulations" are available for 6.99 each while all three games can be purchased in a bundle for $16.99, a $3 saving.The game features higher definition art and the ability to play the game in horizontal mode in addition to vertical. A new social feature, "Everyone Object", allows players the ability to create .gif files of the Ace Attorney characters yelling "Objection", "Hold it" or "Take That" and post them to twitter or email.
